cast.name: 克里斯·帕卡姆 Chris Packham
史蒂夫·贝克肖 Steve Backshall

introduction: The adventure series `Blue Planet Live' explores the health of the world's oceans and the wildlife who live there. It is a live broadcast, meaning one can follow how marine life is coping in the face of increasing environmental pressure with the help of Chris Packham, Liz Bonnin and Steve Backshall. A light is shed on the precious marine life struggling to survive, and how that needs the help of humanity as a whole. From the Bahamas to the Great Barrier Reef, `Blue Planet Live' provides a perfect opportunity to meet the colourful flora and fauna living on the majority share of our planet.
